K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425a-1: a'a rya ni shatsa ya n'a dh'a ra n'i /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-0: 'phags pa gdon mi za @425b ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-1: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-2: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-3: bcom ldan 'das bsha la'i spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-4: de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-6: bdag lha ma yin rnams kyis rgol zhing gtses te /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-7: bdag dang lha ma yin dus yun ring por mi mdza' zhing dgrar gyur na /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ci nas kyang yun
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-9: ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-10: de lta bu'i chos bdag la bshad du gsol /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-11: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-13: de'i phyir ko'u shi ka khyod kyis da'i snying po
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-14: gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-21: pra tyam ga ma aa gatstsha ma h'a ma yu ri n'a ma /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-24: 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa las srungs shig /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-26: sarba k'a ya ma no shtsa ri te sv'ah'a /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:425b-27: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:426a-1: po yid dga' ste bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:426a-2: pa la rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:426a-3: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid
K12D0524=D0977_H0588:426a-4: du mi snang bar gyur to //
